title: Hitting Enter/Return key in Find/Replace dialog has no effect on Mac OS X
description: Hitting the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog does not perform the expected action on Mac OS X.
OB: When the Find/Replace dialog is open on Eclipse 3.0 M2 Build id: 200307181617, running on Mac OS X 10.2.6, and a search term is entered into the text box, pressing the Enter/Return key does not initiate a Find operation.
EB: Pressing the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog on Mac OS X should perform a Find operation, similar to clicking on the 'Find' button.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the Find/Replace dialog (Edit -> Find/Replace). 2) Type a search term into the text box. 3) Press the Enter/Return key. Expected result: The Enter/Return key should initiate a Find operation, just like clicking on the 'Find' button in the dialog.
